name: Fathiraz Arthuro
title: Backend Engineer
summary: A person who likes to solve problems and learn new things. I love to build something that make people's life easier. I have more than 8 years experience in software development and i'm a backend engineer. Ps: I'm an ice americano guy ‚òï
work_preference: I'm looking for a remote job and open to relocate to the place that has good coffee and good food

experiences.summary: Kitabisa.com is an online crowdfunding platform for social and personal medical causes. Since 2013, Kitabisa has facilitated over $40 million in donations from millions of donors across Indonesia.
workarounds: Developed a subscription fee and tipping feature, enabling the company to achieve monthly revenue exceeding IDR 100 million and fostering a sustainable monetization strategy.
Identified bottlenecks in an outdated email queue feature, resulting in solving delays for 13 million campaign-related emails; significantly improved communication efficiency and donor engagement.
Streamlined API performance by implementing a redesigned cache invalidation process, resulting in a remarkable 50% reduction in response time.
Implemented an advanced trace, log, and metric system in code, resulting in a 3x faster, more efficient production tracking process.
Enhanced developer productivity and knowledge by creating comprehensive technical documentation, resulting in a 30% reduction in onboarding time for new team members.

experiences.summary: TaniHub is a B2B agriculture marketplace that connects farmers with food, hotel, restaurant, and catering businesses. It provides an e-commerce platform for agricultural products and empowers local farmers by providing market and financial access.
workarounds: Spearheaded the successful migration of legacy code to a cutting-edge architecture, bolstering API performance and delivering exceptional results, including a significant 4x increase in requests handled per second and notable improvements in response time.

Designed and executed a cutting-edge notification solution, enabling the efficient processing and timely delivery of 10k notifications per hour, resulting in a 20% boost in user response rates and a 15% increase in overall revenue.

experiences.summary: Bhinneka.com is an e-commerce company that focuses on selling electronic devices, digital printing systems, and other related products. It was the first ecommerce company established in Indonesia, back in 1993.
workarounds: Streamlined system performance and reliability by successfully migrating the outdated monolithic application to a microservices architecture, resulting in enhanced maintenance efficiency, elevated customer satisfaction, and accelerated order processing.

Accelerated debugging efforts and facilitated access to production environment information by integrating advanced metrics and comprehensive logs, leading to a 30% decrease in time spent on issue resolution.
Implemented a robust code scanning process, reducing technical debt by identifying and resolving critical issues; achieved a 50% decrease in post-release bugs and improved overall code efficiency.

experiences.summary: Kompas.com is a media company focused on writing online articles and news. It is one of the most popular news website in Indonesia.
workarounds: Build a reliable sports news site that can serve up to 40k concurrent users.
Enhanced journalist experience, productivity, learning curve through merging three news applications into a single Content Management System.
Gain more readers exponentially on the giant social media platform Facebook by creating Facebook Instant Articles. These features allow users to read directly from the Facebook app.
Ensured our news is at the top of Google search engine results by integrating Google AMP into our platform.

experiences.summary: InnPro is a Geographical Information System (GIS) company that focuses on building GIS with the aim of providing data through maps or other means.
workarounds: Improve management decision-making multiple times for opening new company branches or modifying locations for better market reach, a GIS application system can be created for PT. Astra FIF. However, it also improves the revenue.
Displaying the locations of their branches and headquarters on maps.
Providing data on the total number of men and women in each province, city, district, and subdistrict, using BPS data.
Presenting data on the number of individuals earning above or below the minimum regional wage (UMR), based on BPS data.
